en.bannerStart: This is a new service – your
en.bannerEnd: will help us to improve it.
en.warning: You cannot save the progress for the application. So it is important you have everything you need before you get started
en.heading: Submit an application to HM Courts and Tribunal Services
en.body: Use this service to upload and submit a completed application.
subBody: You cannot save your progress so it is important you have everything you need before you start.
You might need to upload supporting documents with your completed application.
Some applications may ask for a fee, so make sure you have your payment details ready.
You will be asked a few simple questions. You can review the answers to these questions before you submit them with your application.
